enhancements.title: New Fish Species Added
enhancements.description: Discover 10 new exotic fish species in the latest update. Each fish has unique abilities and merge combinations that will revolutionize your gameplay.

enhancements.title: Balance Update
enhancements.description: Improved game balance with better merge rewards and adjusted difficulty progression. Players will now experience smoother gameplay and more satisfying rewards.

enhancements.title: Bug Fixes
enhancements.description: Fixed various bugs including merge animation issues and performance improvements. The game now runs smoother than ever before.

enhancements.title: Visual Improvements
enhancements.description: Enhanced underwater graphics with improved lighting effects and more realistic fish animations. The ocean world has never looked better!

enhancements.title: Sound Update
enhancements.description: New ambient ocean sounds and improved fish sound effects. Immerse yourself in the underwater world with enhanced audio experience.

enhancements.title: Mobile Optimization
enhancements.description: Better performance on mobile devices with optimized touch controls and improved battery efficiency.
